SET-ONLY
ASSIGN: port_my0_return_o  <----  port_my0_return_i
ASSIGN: port_my1_o  <----  port_my1_i
ASSIGN: port_my1_mode_o  <----  port_my1_mode_i
ASSIGN: port_my1_send_o  <----  port_my1_send_i
ASSIGN: port_o  <----  port_i
ASSIGN: port_my0_o  <----  port_my0_i
ASSIGN: port_my0_mode_o  <----  port_my0_mode_i
ASSIGN: port_my0_send_o  <----  port_my0_send_i
ASSIGN: port_my1_return_o  <----  port_my1_return_i
ASSIGN: port_uint_o  <----  port_uint_i
DRIVER: port_o: port_i
DRIVER: port_my0_o: port_my0_i
DRIVER: port_my0_mode_o: port_my0_mode_i
DRIVER: port_my0_send_o: port_my0_send_i
DRIVER: port_my0_return_o: port_my0_return_i
DRIVER: port_my1_o: port_my1_i
DRIVER: port_my1_mode_o: port_my1_mode_i
DRIVER: port_my1_send_o: port_my1_send_i
DRIVER: port_my1_return_o: port_my1_return_i
DRIVER: port_uint_o: port_uint_i
